We already have a black bonus of 2, so after the bonus we need 4 black tokens to pay for L2_46. We currently possess 2 tokens in total (green 1, red 1). Taking 2 black tokens is permissible because the board has at least 4 black tokens available, and it will bring our black token count to 4 exactly the amount needed to purchase L2_46 on our next turn. This two‑turn plan (take tokens now, buy L2_46 next turn) is more efficient than buying a free bonus card (L1_26 or L1_5) now and would still require the same number of future turns for the prestige. Therefore the optimal current action is to take 2 black tokens.
